help-file.title: FLEE
help-file.content:
Syntax: flee
If, for instance, the minor daemon you so carefully considered turns out to be a little more than you bargained for, you can attempt to escape by using the "Flee" command. This command, if successful, will allow you to leave the room via the nearest exit, if there is one. However, some monsters will hunt you down in various manners to try and continue the fight, so be warned.
Fleeing is not an effortless action. Extracting yourself from a life or death struggle takes energy, so you will eat up your personal stamina in such attempts. You will lose a significant amount of moves on a flee.
